results.idea: Short-term post-news 1-minute momentum
results.description: Use the immediate 1-minute return after a news item to capture very short-term momentum. I applied SUGGESTION1 by using news_pct_1min and SUGGESTION4 by picking a high-coverage, high-user field (news_pct_1min coverage 0.9717, userCount 218). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no clear vector field used). SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage > 0.6). Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence set to 0.65 based on established intraday drift literature.

results.idea: Post-news 30-minute continuation (momentum)
results.description: Exploit price continuation in first 30 minutes after news using news_pct_30min. Applied SUGGESTION1 with a single robust field (news_pct_30min coverage 0.9717, userCount 185). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Coverage high so SUGGESTION3 skipped. Implementation kept concise (<=2 fields, <=7 operators). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Immediate reversal after extreme 30-second move
results.description: If the 30-second move is extreme, expect short-term mean-reversion. Used news_pct_30sec (coverage 0.9673). Applied SUGGESTION1 (single field selection) and SUGGESTION4 (reasonable userCount). No vector use. Confidence moderate 0.55 because microstructure noise can be high.

results.idea: Volume spike momentum: Curr_Vol relative to 30-day avg
results.description: Use news_ratio_vol (Curr_Vol / Mov_Vol) to identify volume-surprise driven moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 (news_ratio_vol has decent coverage 0.5122 but moderate userCount). Because coverage ~0.51 (<0.6) I applied SUGGESTION3 and backfilled: ts_backfill(news_ratio_vol,5). No vector operators. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: ATR breakout after news: intraday volatility expansion
results.description: High news_atr_ratio signals expansion and momentum; trade direction of the early move. I applied SUGGESTION1 using news_atr_ratio (coverage 0.7967, userCount 588) and SUGGESTION4 (high alphaCount). No vector usage. Coverage high so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Gap-fade at open after news-driven overnight gap
results.description: Fade large open gaps using news_open_gap ((DayOpen - PrevClose)/PrevClose). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 (coverage 0.6247). Coverage near 0.62 (slightly above 0.6) so ts_backfill not used. Kept simple. Confidence 0.5 due to execution risk.

results.idea: Earnings surprise drift using reported EPS actual
results.description: Use news_eps_actual momentum vs history: stocks with large positive eps_actual tend to continue. Applied SUGGESTION1 with news_eps_actual (coverage 0.9646, high userCount). SUGGESTION2 not needed. Confidence 0.68 because earnings surprises are predictive.

results.idea: Post-news intraday relative to SPY (index-adjusted drift)
results.description: Neutralize market move via news_indx_perf ((EODClose - TONLast)/TONLast - SPY change). I applied SUGGESTION1 using news_indx_perf (coverage 0.9713) and SUGGESTION4. No backfill required. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: VWAP reversion: price deviating from post-news VWAP
results.description: Mean-revert if TONLast far from news_eod_vwap (post-news VWAP). Applied SUGGESTION1 combining news_ton_last and news_eod_vwap (both high coverage). SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Implementation uses 2 fields and <7 operators. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Post-news 120-minute momentum
results.description: Capture medium intraday continuation using news_pct_120min (coverage 0.9063). Applied SUGGESTION1; high coverage so no backfill. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Tick-activity breakout: total ticks surge
results.description: news_tot_ticks spike indicates informational flow and short-term continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 with news_tot_ticks (coverage 0.9691, userCount 673). High confidence for intraday activity: 0.6.

results.idea: Volatility-normalized post-news move (stddev scaling)
results.description: Use news_high_exc_stddev to scale the after-news high relative to 30-day stddev to find extreme moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 (coverage 0.9652) and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Downside excursion mean-reversion using low_exc_stddev
results.description: Use news_low_exc_stddev to detect extreme downward outliers likely to mean-revert. Applied SUGGESTION1 (coverage 0.9707). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short interest contrarian: high short interest rebound
results.description: Highly shorted names (news_short_interest) can mean-revert or squeeze; trade small-cap rebounds. Applied SUGGESTION1 using news_short_interest (coverage 0.872). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.52 due to crowding risk.

results.idea: PE ratio mean-reversion after news
results.description: Use news_pe_ratio to target valuation mean reversion after news-driven moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 selecting news_pe_ratio (coverage 0.9662, high userCount). Confidence 0.48 (valuation signals are slower).

results.idea: High-volume fade: immediate close-volume spike exhaustion
results.description: If news_close_vol >> avg, price extremes often revert by EOD. Used news_close_vol and news_mov_vol (two fields). Both have reasonable coverage. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. No backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Post-news 5-minute micro-momentum
results.description: Use news_pct_5_min to capture very short-term continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 (coverage 0.774). Because coverage >0.6, no backfill. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Pre-market vs post-news VWAP gap trade
results.description: Use news_pre_vwap vs news_post_vwap to pick continuation/reversion across sessions. Applied SUGGESTION1 with both fields (coverage >0.7). SUGGESTION4 moderately applied. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Session-range breakout using news_session_range_pct
results.description: Large session range relative to recent suggests momentum. Used news_session_range_pct (coverage 0.268 low) so applied SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(news_session_range_pct,10) before zscoring. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.45 (low coverage increases uncertainty).

results.idea: Post-news 60-minute momentum
results.description: Use news_pct_60min to capture medium-short continuation (coverage 0.9692). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Relative volume acceleration times range: vol_stddev * range_stddev
results.description: Combine news_vol_stddev and news_range_stddev to spot extreme information events. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two high-coverage fields (vol_stddev 0.9672, range_stddev 0.6172). Because range_stddev ~0.6172 (>0.6) no backfill. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by liquidity: pct_30min / mov_vol
results.description: Scale early momentum by liquidity to avoid low-liquidity noise. Used news_pct_30min and news_mov_vol (both high coverage). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Intraday reversal after extreme 10-minute move
results.description: Use news_pct_10min extreme signals to reverse short-term moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 (coverage 0.7657). No backfill needed. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Post-news 90-minute continuation
results.description: Capture continuation using news_pct_90min (coverage 0.9692). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Pre-news volatility ramp: ATR14 before news
results.description: Use news_atr14 as pre-news realized volatility to size momentum trades. Applied SUGGESTION1 (coverage 0.8947, strong userCount). Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Price impact asymmetry: news_ls directional bias
results.description: Use news_ls (long/short indicator) to bias trades toward the historically better side. news_ls coverage 0.488 low so I applied ts_backfill(news_ls,5). Applied SUGGESTION4 selectively (alphaCount high). Confidence 0.42 due to low coverage.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on market (SPY) level
results.description: Multiply short-term news move by sign of SPY intraday move using news_spy_close and news_ton_last of SPY proxy. I used news_indx_perf instead to keep to one field representing index-adjusted move (coverage 0.9713). SUGGESTION1 satisfied; simple implementation. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: EOD reversion for overnight news: close vs TONLast
results.description: If EODClose deviates sharply from TONLast, expect reversion/adaptation next day. Used news_eod_close and news_ton_last (both high coverage). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.49 (overnight uncertainties).

results.idea: Speed of move: minutes to 1% up/down as signal of conviction
results.description: Use news_mins_1_pct_up and news_mins_1_pct_dn; fast moves imply high conviction and continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 with two fields and chose to use vec_avg if these are bucket vectors for robustness (SUGGESTION2). Both fields have decent coverage; no backfill. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Direction persistence across buckets: compare 1-min vs 30-min pct
results.description: If 1-min and 30-min moves align, increase conviction. Used news_pct_1min and news_pct_30min (both high coverage). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Microstructure exhaustion: minutes to 3% down then quick bounce
results.description: Use news_mins_3s (minutes before a 3% down) to detect panic that may mean-revert. Field coverage good (0.9174). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Earnings magnitude normalized by market cap
results.description: Scale news_eps_actual by news_cap to find impactful earnings for small caps. Applied SUGGESTION1 combining news_eps_actual (high coverage) and news_cap (0.8272). SUGGESTION4 satisfied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: After-hours immediate move magnitude predictor
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_1_minute (after-hours 1-minute pct) to trade early next session continuation. Coverage moderate (0.255) so applied ts_backfill(nws12_afterhsz_1_minute,5). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Large provider-induced moves: provider index effect
results.description: Some news providers produce systematically stronger moves; use nws12_mainz_provider (provider index) combined with magnitude nws12_mainz_1_minute. I apply SUGGESTION1 and avoid group operators. Provider index treated as discrete; confidence modest 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market cap (small-cap tilt)
results.description: Favor momentum in smaller caps: news_pct_30min * inverse(news_mktcap). Used news_pct_30min and nws12_mainz_mktcap (high coverage). Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Post-news volatility mean-reversion using volstddev
results.description: High news_vol_stddev often mean-reverts intraday; short volatility spikes. Applied SUGGESTION1 with news_vol_stddev (coverage 0.9672). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: First-minute gap continuation when aligned with ATR
results.description: If first minute move and atr are both large, expect continuation. Combined news_pct_1min and news_atr14 (both high coverage) per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: EOD high-excursion breakout filter
results.description: Use news_high_exc_stddev to select names with significant upward excursions and ride continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: EOD low-excursion contrarian filter
results.description: Use news_low_exc_stddev to pick oversold after-news names for short-term bounce. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Fast vs slow move divergence: 1-min vs 120-min disagreement
results.description: If short-term and longer-term moves disagree, trade toward the longer-term sign (mean-reversion of micro moves). Used news_pct_1min and news_pct_120min (both high coverage). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: After-news 30-minute move normalized by tick activity
results.description: Divide early price move by news_tot_ticks to filter noisy moves. Used news_pct_30min and news_tot_ticks (high coverage). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum that survives 30 minutes and volatility contraction
results.description: Trade continuation only if pct_30min strong and volstddev decreases (momentum with calming volatility). Used news_pct_30min and news_vol_stddev. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Low PE momentum: favor momentum in low PE names post-news
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min with news_pe_ratio to tilt toward low PE continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion after extreme ATR day
results.description: If news_atr_ratio very high, expect intraday mean-reversion later; use ts_zscore of atr ratio. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Fade first 10-min spike if minutes-to-10pct short
results.description: If news_mins_10_pct_up/dn are very small (fast big move), fade due to exhaustion. Fields have mixed coverage; used vec_avg(news_mins_10_pct_up) to smooth (SUGGESTION2). Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: After-hours gap momentum into session
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_01p (10-min pct after-hours) to predict continuation at open. Coverage ~0.3704 low; applied ts_backfill(nws12_afterhsz_10_min,5). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Earnings magnitude per share-change drift
results.description: Use nws12_prez_epsactual (pre-market eps actual) to detect stocks with outsized earnings impact. Coverage >0.75; applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum only when market idx doesn't offset (result_vs_index)
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_result_vs_index to ensure stock move is idiosyncratic. Field coverage high 0.9733. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Open imbalance: main open vol vs mov_vol signal
results.description: If open volume (news_open_vol) much larger than mov_vol, expect price momentum. news_open_vol coverage 0.4361 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill(news_open_vol,5) per SUGGESTION3. Combined with news_mov_vol. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Rapid minute-based movement consistency (1,2,3 min)
results.description: Aggregate early minute buckets (1,2,3) using vec_sum or vec_avg to measure consistent direction (SUGGESTION2). I use vec_sum over news_pct_1min, news_pct_2_min, news_pct_3min if available; to keep within 2 datafields, use vec_sum(news_pct_1min). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Low-hour continuation: 120-min move in low-liquidity names
results.description: Use news_pct_120min and inverse news_mov_vol to favor low-liquidity continuation. Both fields coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Price relative to pre-news ton high/low (momentum/reversion)
results.description: If after-news EODHigh >> TONLast suggest continuation to upside; use news_max_up_ret and max_dn_ret to create directional score. Applied SUGGESTION1 with news_max_up_ret and news_max_dn_ret (high coverage). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Net information intensity: ticks * volstddev
results.description: Combine news_tot_ticks and news_vol_stddev to measure informational intensity. Applied SUGGESTION1 picking high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term reversal when EODVwap diverges from main_vwap
results.description: If news_eod_vwap deviates much from news_main_vwap, expect reversion. Applied SUGGESTION1 with high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Persistent movers: ts_arg_max of pct over lookback
results.description: Use ts_arg_max(news_pct_30min,7) to find names hitting recent maxima (momentum continuation). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Micro mean-reversion after long intraday run: ts_max_diff
results.description: Use ts_max_diff(news_ton_last,5) to detect if current price equals recent max and then fade. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by short interest decile
results.description: Favor momentum in moderate short-interest deciles using group logic outside scope; here use news_short_interest and quantile to bucket. SUGGESTION1 applied with news_short_interest (coverage 0.872). No group operator used per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Intraday continuation only when open gap aligns with 1-min move
results.description: Multiply news_open_gap and news_pct_1min to require alignment. Both fields coverage OK. Applied SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Post-news range contraction breakout
results.description: If session range (news_session_range) contracts significantly then sudden breakout direction often persists; because coverage low (0.4236) I ts_backfill(news_session_range,5). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum with dispersion filter: news_result_vs_index and eod move
results.description: Use news_result_vs_index and news_eod_close to ensure idiosyncratic continuation. Both fields high coverage. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short-term continuation only when minutes-to-1% is long (sustained moves)
results.description: If news_mins_1_pct_up is large, the move is gradual and may persist; used vec_avg(news_mins_1_pct_up) per SUGGESTION2. Coverage strong. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by recent volatility (eps / vol)
results.description: Divide news_eps_actual by news_atr14 to favor surprises in low-vol names. Applied SUGGESTION1 choosing high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum iff ticks and volume both above historical mean
results.description: Require both news_tot_ticks and news_curr_vol scaled by mov_vol to be high; combine using multiply. news_curr_vol coverage 0.7769; news_tot_ticks high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Post-news fade for names with very high volstddev
results.description: If news_vol_stddev extremely high, fade short-term due to overreaction. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on not-new-record (avoid duplicates)
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_newrecord to avoid duplicate-news induced noise; trade only when newrecord==1. Coverage high (0.9741). Applied trade_when to gate a momentum signal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Post-news continuation signaled by early vwap gap
results.description: If news_ton_last deviates from news_main_vwap, and ticks high, trade in direction. Used two fields news_ton_last and news_main_vwap and news_tot_ticks (but limit to 2 fields by using ticks zscore only). Kept implementation concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Intraday rotation: trade names moving opposite of SPY
results.description: Use news_indx_perf negative signals (stock moving vs SPY) to capture relative strength reversal. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Post-open fade for oversized open gap with low follow-through ticks
results.description: If big open gap (news_open_gap) but low ticks (news_tot_ticks), fade the direction. Applied SUGGESTION1; if news_open_gap coverage low ts_backfill would apply but here coverage ~0.6247 so ok. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: EOD VWAP continuation into next day
results.description: If news_post_vwap deviates significantly from prev close, expect next-day drift. Used news_post_vwap and news_prev_close (prev close coverage low 0.1728 so I ts_backfill(news_prev_close,5) per SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Strong intraday moves in low-short-interest names favored
results.description: Scale momentum by inverse short interest so that high short interest names are de-weighted (news_short_interest). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Earnings surprise direction combined with volume spike
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual zscore with news_curr_vol/mov_vol to pick impactful surprises with volume. Both fields have acceptable coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Fast microtrend filter: arg_max on 3-minute pct
results.description: Use ts_arg_max(news_pct_3min,7) to spot instruments setting short-run highs and ride them. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Post-news breakout only when range_stddev low (calm base)
results.description: Require low news_rangestddev and high pct_30min to improve breakout quality. Used news_rangestddev (coverage 0.6172) and news_pct_30min. Because rangestddev ~0.6172 I did not backfill. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Signal smoothing via ts_mean of recent pct_5_min
results.description: Smooth noisy 5-min moves with ts_mean(news_pct_5_min,3) and trade direction of smoothed series. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High-confidence continuation when multiple minute buckets align
results.description: Require alignment of pct_1min, pct_5_min, and pct_30min; to stay within 2-datafield limit, use product of zscores of pct_1min and pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Volume-weighted momentum: pct_30min * eod_vwap gap
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min and gap to eod_vwap to confirm direction. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Trade only news with unique records (avoid duplicates)
results.description: Use nws12_allz_newrecord to filter duplicates; apply to a momentum signal. Coverage high 0.9745 so reliable. SUGGESTION1 & KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Post-news micro mean-reversion after 30-sec spike
results.description: If news_pct_30sec extreme, take contrarian small intraday position. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Large-cap momentum dampening (cap-adjusted)
results.description: Downweight momentum in very large caps by multiplying by inverse of news_cap (SUGGESTION1). news_cap coverage high. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Rapid minute upticks consistency: use mins_1_chg
results.description: Use news_mins_1_chg (min of L or S for 1-minute bucket) to measure consistency; SUGGESTION2 apply vec_avg if vector-like. Field coverage high. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Trade when percent move persists across 30 and 60 minutes
results.description: Multiply zscore of news_pct_30min and news_pct_60min to ensure persistent moves. Both fields have excellent coverage. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Fade extremes in after-hours then open (afterhsz 01l/01s)
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_01l and _01s (minutes to 10% moves) to identify overreactions; coverage ~0.707 so SUGGESTION3 not necessary. Implemented simple reversal. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by prior-day intraday return
results.description: Use news_prev_day_ret (coverage 0.7311) to damp signals that come after extreme prior-day moves. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings drift controlled by provider (some providers more predictive)
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_provider as a filter: only trade earnings from providers with historical edge; implemented by gating result. Provider index coverage high. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Mean-revert long-run extremes: 30-minute extreme vs 30-day stddev
results.description: Use news_pct_30min scaled by news_high_exc_stddev to identify true extremes to fade. Applied SUGGESTION1 selecting high-coverage fields. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum when open-gap aligns with post-vwap move
results.description: Trade only if news_open_gap and news_post_vwap gap share sign. Used both fields (coverage acceptable). Kept implementation short. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Intraday continuation if range scaled by ATR low (breakout from compression)
results.description: If news_range_stddev low (compression) and pct_30min breaks out, trade in breakout direction. news_range_stddev coverage ~0.6172; used as-is. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Trade only when tick activity confirms price move
results.description: Require news_tot_ticks zscore above threshold to accept pct_1min signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two fields. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term momentum with winsorized outlier control
results.description: Winsorize pct_30min to reduce outlier impacts and then zscore. Used winsorize + ts_zscore (both allowed). SUGGESTION1 applied to news_pct_30min. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum only in names with rising mov_vol trend
results.description: Use ts_zscore of news_mov_vol trend to favor names with increasing baseline volume. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Trade when pre-news vwap gap confirms post-news pct_10min
results.description: Combine news_pre_vwap gap and news_pct_10min to require confirmation from pre/post order flow. Both fields have decent coverage. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Earnings surprise hit-and-run: short horizon after press release
results.description: Trade immediate pct_1min scaled by ticks to capture quick moves from earnings. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Volatility breakout persistence if ATR and volstddev both high
results.description: Multiply news_atr_ratio and news_vol_stddev to find strong volatility events that continue. Both fields high coverage. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Fade when pct moves but ticks low (failed moves)
results.description: If pct_30min large but news_tot_ticks low, fade expecting weak conviction. SUGGESTION1 used with two fields. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized volume ratio
results.description: Use winsorize on Curr_Vol / Mov_Vol (news_ratio_vol) to stabilize extremes, then zscore. Because coverage ~0.5122 (<0.6) apply ts_backfill before winsorize. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Post-news 5-minute reversal in names with large PE
results.description: High PE names may overreact intraday; reverse news_pct_5_min scaled by news_pe_ratio. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Sustained mover detection: ts_ir of pct_30min (mean/std)
results.description: Use ts_ir(news_pct_30min,20) to find instruments with consistent favorable info ratio recently. SUGGESTION1 applied; ts_ir available. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with session-range confirmation
results.description: Require pct_30min aligned with session_range to boost signal. Used news_session_range (coverage low 0.4236) so ts_backfill(news_session_range,5) applied. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Quick-strike strategy on minute buckets aggregate
results.description: Aggregate small-minute percent moves (1,2,3 min) via vec_sum/vec_avg to detect microtrends (SUGGESTION2). Use vec_avg on news_pct_1min as proxy. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Trade when news_eod_high significantly exceeds TONLast (breakout)
results.description: Use news_eod_high - news_ton_last scaled by stddev to find breakout strength. Applied SUGGESTION1 with high coverage fields. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Low-turnover continuation: pct_30min strong but ts_count_nans low
results.description: Favor signals in names with consistent data (use ts_count_nans if available); since not in list, instead require ticks and vol ratios to be coherent. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Fade micro spikes signaled by 30sec pct but low 10-min follow-through
results.description: If news_pct_30sec large but pct_10min small, treat as spike and fade. Used two fields news_pct_30sec and news_pct_10min. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Intraday trend strength via ts_kurtosis of returns
results.description: High kurtosis indicates fat tails; use ts_kurtosis(news_pct_30min,30) as a filter to avoid extremes. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum after large post-news upmove and low prev-day return
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min high and low news_prev_day_ret to find fresh moves. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Use ts_arg_min of pct_30min to find recently bottoming names
results.description: ts_arg_min(news_pct_30min,7) identifies relative bottoms to buy for mean-reversion. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum after provider-confirmed moves only
results.description: Require news provider index (nws12_prez_provider) to be among historically predictive ones; gate momentum by provider using trade_when. Coverage good. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Small-cap earnings momentum using mktcap scaling
results.description: Scale earnings drift by inverse mktcap (nws12_mainz_mktcap) to favor impactful small-caps. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Intraday breakout only when prevwap confirms (pre vs post)
results.description: Require alignment of news_prevwap and news_post_vwap to accept breakout; used two fields with good coverage (where available). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Use ts_regression slope of pct_1min to quantify short-run trend
results.description: Compute regression slope via ts_regression(news_pct_1min, ts_step, 10) to estimate trend acceleration. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Trade when post-news highs are extreme but low ticks (likely manipulation)
results.description: If news_high_exc_stddev very high but tot_ticks low, fade expecting weak follow-through. Used two fields. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Momentum filter using moving average of pct_30min (ts_mean over 3 events)
results.description: Use ts_mean(news_pct_30min,3) to ensure signal isn't a one-off. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Use vec_range of minute buckets to detect intraday dispersion (SUGGESTION2)
results.description: Compute vec_range over minute-bucket vector (e.g., news_pct_1min vectorized) to find unstable names; coverage high where vectors exist. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Trade when 30-min move exceeds 30-day avg range (range_stddev)
results.description: Use news_rangestddev to detect moves beyond normal daily range and take momentum or mean-revert depending on sign. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum only when prevclose confirms continuation
results.description: Check that news_prevclose (backfilled if needed) aligns with early pct_10min; news_prevclose coverage low 0.1728 so ts_backfill(news_prevclose,5) used. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Combine eod_vwap gap and ticks to reduce false signals
results.description: Multiply zscore of (eod_vwap - ton_last) by ticks zscore. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum only when news not duplicate and ticks high
results.description: Gate by nws12_allz_newrecord==1 and require news_tot_ticks high using trade_when. Coverage and userCounts high so useful. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term mean-revert when pct_30min is extreme but volstddev rising
results.description: If pct_30min extreme and volstddev rising, prefer fade. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized ticks to avoid microstructure spikes
results.description: Winsorize news_tot_ticks then multiply by pct_1min zscore. Applied SUGGESTION1 & winsorize. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Post-news 3-minute reversal when mins_3_chg short
results.description: If news_mins_3_chg small (fast 3-minute move), expect reversal. Used vec_avg(news_mins_3_chg) to smooth per SUGGESTION2. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Trade when pct_60min and pct_90min both positive (robust continuation)
results.description: Multiply zscores of pct_60min and pct_90min to require persistence. Both fields have excellent coverage. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Use ts_max_diff of ton_last to detect breakout strength
results.description: ts_max_diff(news_ton_last,10) isolates names near their recent highs; trade continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum only when prevday not extreme (avoid continuation after big prior move)
results.description: Downweight signals when news_prev_day_ret extreme using reverse(ts_zscore(news_prev_day_ret,60)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: First-minute continuation in names with high short_interest (squeeze potential)
results.description: Multiply news_pct_1min by news_short_interest to capture squeeze risk. Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Use percentile bucketing (quantile) of pct_30min to size positions
results.description: Quantile(news_pct_30min) gives cross-sectional bucket; applied SUGGESTION1 and quantile operator to normalize across universe. Confidence 0.58.
